required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment of Low Back Pain in Pregnant Women : Uses of Drugs and Other Therapies
clinical_study.official_title: Treatment of Low Back Pain in Pregnant Women ; Uses of Drugs and Other Therapies (Acupuncture, Manipulative Medicine, Physical Therapies, Homeopathy) : an Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock:
Low back pain is a frequent clinical condition in pregnancy. Drugs treatments are limited. Other therapies are often used, associated or not with drugs (acupuncture, manipulative medicine, physical therapies, homeopathy). Clinical studies suggest a reduction of low back pain with these therapies.
The primary objective of this study is to determinate how many pregnant women use these alternative therapeutics.
In a second time, we want evaluate efficiency of these therapeutics, especially in pain modification and on quality of life.
Our study is a declarative study on pregnant women in Lorraine.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of use of other therapies in pregnant women with low back pain ( acunpucture, manipulative medicine, physical therapies, homeopathy)
primary_outcome.time_frame: one day : when each pregnant women submit the questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of visual analog scale for pain after and before treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day : when each pregnant women submit the questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of quality life scale after and before treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day : when each pregnant women submit the questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Including : affect, walking, sleep, work, social relations. Scale between 0 and 10 for each item

arm_group.arm_group_label: pregnant women with low back pain

intervention.arm_group_label: pregnant women with low back pain

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- pregnant women
Exclusion Criteria:
- medical history of : bifida spina, discal hernia, osteoporosis, vertebral compaction, spondylolisthesis, scoliosis ( over 30°)

facility.name: Centre hospitalier régional universitaire de Nancy
